datas1.title: Bamboo Stand
datas1.subTitle: Pledge $25 or more
datas1.text: You get an ergonomic stand made of natural bamboo. You've helped us launch our promotional campaign, and youll be added to a special Backer member list

datas1.title: Black Edition Stand
datas1.subTitle: Pledge $75 or more
datas1.text: You get a Black Special Edition computer stand and a personal thank you. You’ll be added to our Backer member list. Shipping is included.

datas1.title: Mahogany Special Edition
datas1.subTitle: Pledge $200 or more
datas1.text: You get two Special Edition Mahogany stands, a Backer T-Shirt, and a personal thank you. You’ll be added to our Backer member list. Shipping is included.

datas2.title: Pledge with no reward
datas2.text: Choose to support us without a reward if you simply believe in our project. As a backer, you will be signed up to receive product updates via email.
